org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.activity

Class AtomicActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.activity.BaseActivity
      • org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.activity.AtomicActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasLabels, Activity

    public class AtomicActivity
extends BaseActivity
    Workflow activity representing an algorithm, a tool, or a method.
    Author:
    clc
